content:
I don't have access to real-time data on the latest successful startups that have come out of punjab. however, there have been success stories emerging from punjab's startups scene. some of the prominent startups in punjab are:

1) jugnoo: one of india's leading ride-hailings platforms, jugnoo started as an auto-rickshaw aggregator app in chandigarh in 2015. 

2) banihal: banihal is a matchmaking platform for professional singles with a unique matching algorithm. it was founded in 2012 by ishdeep sawhney and grew rapidly into a global enterprise. 

3) saanjh: saanjh is an online marketplace that connects farmers with consumers. the platform maximizes the value of the farmers' produce by eliminating intermediaries' involvement and provides consumers with fresh and organic food. 

4) swachhmap: swachhmap is a mobile app that helps users find the nearest toilet facilities within seconds. the app collects and curates information about toilets and makes it accessible to the public.

these startups have brought innovation to their respective fields, creating value for their users, and strengthening the entrepreneurial ecosystem in punjab.
